items.summary: Fix the production styling issue where the Pawfect Care landing page appears black-and-white by ensuring the intended Chewy-blue Tailwind theme variables are applied at runtime and are not overridden by conflicting/duplicate theme stylesheets (notably resolve any conflict between frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css).

In the “Happy Pets, Happy Hearts” section of frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLanding.tsx, keep only three images: the dog nail cutting image, the dog teeth cleaning image, and the dog ear cleaning image; remove all other images from that section.

Replace the Bath & Brush service card image in the Services section of frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLanding.tsx with the newly uploaded image file image-20.png, using a base-path-safe asset URL strategy (publicAssetUrl) so it renders correctly in production.
Rebuild and deploy the updated Pawfect Care Draft Version 2 frontend so the live production deployment includes the restored Chewy-blue colors and the specified image updates.
